text: The 2017–18 ISU Challenger Series took place from September to December 2017. It was the fourth season of a group of senior-level international figure skating competitions ranked below the Grand Prix series. == Events == The 2017–18 series was composed of ten events. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Date ! Event ! Location ! Details |- | September 13–17 | 2017 CS U.S. International Classic | Salt Lake City, Utah, United States | Details |- | September 14–17 | 2017 CS Lombardia Trophy | Bergamo, Italy | Details |- | September 20–23 | 2017 CS Autumn Classic | Montreal, Quebec, Canada | Details |- | September 21–23 | 2017 CS Ondrej Nepela Trophy | Bratislava, Slovakia | Details |- | September 27–30 | 2017 CS Nebelhorn Trophy | Oberstdorf, Germany | Details |- | October 6–8 | 2017 CS Finlandia Trophy | Espoo, Finland | Details |- | October 27–29 | 2017 CS Minsk-Arena Ice Star | Minsk, Belarus | Details |- | November 16–19 | 2017 CS Warsaw Cup | Warsaw, Poland | Details |- | November 21–26 | 2017 CS Tallinn Trophy | Tallinn, Estonia | Details |- | December 6–9 | 2017 CS Golden Spin of Zagreb | Zagreb, Croatia | Details |} == Medal summary == === Men === {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan=5 | Challenger Series |- !
